title: Clorox Recalls 37 Million Pine-Sol Products for Possible Bacteria; The company voluntarily recalled the cleaners, which may pose health risks for people with compromised immune systems
text:
The company said in a statement that it recalled the products "out of an abundance of caution."

People who have compromised immune systems or use an external medical device could require medical treatment if they develop an infection, Clorox said. The bacteria usually doesn't affect people with healthy immune systems, the company said.

The recall applies to Pine-Sol scented multi-surface cleaners in lavender clean, sparkling wave and lemon fresh scents. CloroxPro Pine-Sol all-purpose cleaners in lavender clean, sparkling wave, lemon fresh and orange energy scents were also recalled. The company also recalled Clorox Professional Pine-Sol lemon fresh cleaners.

The products were sold nationwide at retailers including Walmart Inc., Target Corp. and Dollar General Corp., as well as through online vendors such as Amazon.com Inc., Clorox said.

Original Pine-Sol with pine scent hasn't been recalled and is safe to use, the company said.

People should immediately stop using these recalled products, the company said. People who bought these products should take a picture of the product's UPC code and contact Pine-Sol for a refund, the company said.
